languages.text: {n}Инцендия погружает серебряную ложечку в мозг несчастного и неторопливо съедает омерзительное яство.{/n} "Я хочу знать, каковы мысли грешников на вкус. Учусь распознавать, как они думают".
{n}Incendia sinks her silver spoon into the man's brain and slowly consumes the revolting morsel.{/n} "I must know the taste of a criminal's thoughts. It is how I learn to recognise their patterns."
languages.original_text: {n}Инцендия погружает серебряную ложечку в мозг несчастного и неторопливо съедает омерзительное яство.{/n} "Я хочу знать, каковы мысли грешников на вкус. Учусь распознавать, как они думают".

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia sinks her silver spoon into the man's brain and slowly consumes this revolting morsel.{/n} "I must know the taste of a criminal's thoughts. It is how I learn to recognise their patterns."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅将银勺子深入那个男人的脑浆，慢慢地咽下了这令人作呕的血肉。{/n}“我必须弄清楚罪犯思想的味道，这样才能学会识别罪犯的特征。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia sinks her silver spoon into the man's brain and slowly consumes the revolting morsel.{/n} "I must know the taste of a criminal's thoughts. It is how I learn to recognise their patterns."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅将银勺子深入那个男人的脑浆，慢慢地咽下了这令人作呕的血肉。{/n}“我必须弄清楚罪犯思想的味道，这样才能学会识别罪犯的特征。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}インセンディアは銀のスプーンを男の脳みそに沈ませ、ゆっくりと、この忌まわしい一品を口にした。{/n}「罪人の思考の味を知らなければならない。こうすることで、彼らの行動パターンを理解するのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia sinks her silver spoon into the man's brain and slowly consumes the revolting morsel.{/n} "I must know the taste of a criminal's thoughts. It is how I learn to recognise their patterns."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアは銀のスプーンを男の脳みそに沈ませ、ゆっくりと、この忌まわしい一品を口にした。{/n}「罪人の思考の味を知らなければならない。こうすることで、彼らの行動パターンを理解するのだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia hunde su cuchara de plata en el cerebro del hombre y se lleva el trozo repugnante a la boca.{/n} «Debo conocer el sabor de los pensamientos de un criminal. Así aprendo a reconocer sus patrones».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia sinks her silver spoon into the man's brain and slowly consumes the revolting morsel.{/n} "I must know the taste of a criminal's thoughts. It is how I learn to recognise their patterns."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia hunde su cuchara de plata en el cerebro del hombre y se lleva el trozo repugnante a la boca.{/n} «Debo conocer el sabor de los pensamientos de un criminal. Así aprendo a reconocer sus patrones».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia taucht ihren silbernen Löffel in das Gehirn des Mannes und verzehrt diesen widerwärtigen Happen langsam.{/n} "Ich muss wissen, wie die Gedanken eines Verbrechers schmecken. So lerne ich, ihre Muster zu erkennen."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia sinks her silver spoon into the man's brain and slowly consumes the revolting morsel.{/n} "I must know the taste of a criminal's thoughts. It is how I learn to recognise their patterns."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia taucht ihren silbernen Löffel in das Gehirn des Mannes und verzehrt diesen widerwärtigen Happen langsam.{/n} "Ich muss wissen, wie die Gedanken eines Verbrechers schmecken. So lerne ich, ihre Muster zu erkennen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia plonge sa cuillère en argent dans le cerveau de l'homme, puis la porte à ses lèvres et déguste lentement cette répugnante bouchée.{/n} « Je dois connaître le goût des pensées des criminels. C'est ainsi que j'apprends à reconnaître leurs pratiques. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia sinks her silver spoon into the man's brain and slowly consumes the revolting morsel.{/n} "I must know the taste of a criminal's thoughts. It is how I learn to recognise their patterns."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia plonge sa cuillère en argent dans le cerveau de l'homme, puis la porte à ses lèvres et déguste lentement cette répugnante bouchée.{/n} « Je dois connaître le goût des pensées des criminels. C'est ainsi que j'apprends à reconnaître leurs pratiques. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia, gümüş kaşığını adamın beynine saplayıp iğrenç lokmasını yavaş yavaş çiğniyor.{/n} "Suçluların düşüncelerinin tadının nasıl olduğunu öğrenirim. Bu sayede eylem kalıplarını tanıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia sinks her silver spoon into the man's brain and slowly consumes the revolting morsel.{/n} "I must know the taste of a criminal's thoughts. It is how I learn to recognise their patterns."

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia, gümüş kaşığını adamın beynine saplıyor ve iğrenç lokmasını yavaş yavaş çiğniyor.{/n} "Suçluların düşüncelerinin tadının nasıl olduğunu öğrenmeliyim. Eylem kalıplarını tanımayı bu şekilde öğreniyorum."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
